title: Tata Power to invest Rs 20,000 crore in FY25: N Chandrasekaran
description: N Chandrasekaran said that the company is well positioned to lead India's green energy shift with a focus on providing round-the-clock renewable energy, especially to commercial and industrial consumers. It is also aggressively looking at growth in rooftop solar, aiming for increased market share on the back of PM Surya Ghar Yojana.
